item.title: CVE-2024-27961|2024-03-17T16:33:28.460Z -- Codekraft -- AntiSpam for Contact Form 7
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Codekraft AntiSpam for Contact Form 7 allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects AntiSpam for Contact Form 7: from n/a through 0.6.0.
